name: Machine Learning Specialization
subCourses: Machine Learning Specialization - Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification
Machine Learning Specialization - Advanced Learning Algorithms
Machine Learning Specialization - Unsupervised Learning, Recommenders, Reinforcement Learning
desc: This Specialization covers the fundamental concepts and techniques in machine learning. It provides a broad introduction to the field, including supervised learning (regression, classification), unsupervised learning, and deep learning. It will equip you with the skills to apply machine learning algorithms to real-world problems.
